meanings.def: feeling that you want to eat something
examples: All this talk of food is making me hungry.
There were eight hungry mouths (= hungry people) to feed at home.
We were all ravenously hungry after the walk.
I have a hungry family to feed.

meanings.def: not having enough food to eat
examples: Thousands are going hungry because of the failure of this year's harvest.
Over 850 million people worldwide are hungry.
There are tens of thousands of hungry children in this country.

meanings.def: people who do not have enough food to eat
causing you to feel that you want to eat something
examples: All this gardening is hungry work.

meanings.def: having or showing a strong desire for something
examples: hungry for something Both parties are hungry for power.
The child is simply hungry for affection.
We like to use small agencies that are hungry for our business.
hungry to do something Every day they come to school hungry to learn.
His eyes had a wild hungry look in them.
